Name: Scan Jammer - Single-Frequency
Effect: A Scan Jammer that increases your chance of evasion during a ship scan by 10% if you're using a shielded cargo module and carrying contraband

Name: Scan Jammer - Dual-Frequency
Effect: A Scan Jammer that increases your chance of evasion during a ship scan by 30% if you're using a shielded cargo module and carrying contraband

Name: Scan Jammer - Multi-Frequency
Effect: A Scan Jammer that increases your chance of evasion during a ship scan by 50% if you're using a shielded cargo module and carrying contraband

Name: ComSpike
Effect: Time to lock onto enemy ships is reduced by 25%, and weapons cost 20% less to use in Targeting Mode.

Name: Conduction Grid
Effect: Reduces EM Damage by 50%, and increases shield regeneration by 25%.
